projects.name: StudyMate
projects.shortDescription: StudyMate is a platform that helps students find compatible study partners based on subject, experience level, and preferred study mode (Online, In-Person, Hybrid).

details.description: A student collaboration platform that connects learners with compatible study partners based on subject, experience level, and study mode preferences, featuring a smart discovery system and request management.
challenges: Managing partner request state across multiple components
Implementing real-time search and filtering without performance lag
Synchronizing theme toggle across all components and persistent storage
Handling concurrent partner requests and preventing duplicates
Ensuring data consistency between frontend and MongoDB backend
futurePlans: Add real-time chat functionality between matched study partners
Implement study session scheduling with calendar integration
Create a rating and review system for completed study partnerships
Add email notifications for new partner requests and acceptances
Build recommendation algorithm based on past successful matches
Integrate video call functionality for online study sessions
Add study group creation for multiple partners studying together

projects.name: ContestHub
projects.shortDescription: A full-stack creative contest management platform with role-based access and Stripe payments.

details.description: A production-ready contest management platform enabling users to explore, register, and participate in creative contests through secure payments. Features role-based dashboards for admins, contest creators, and participants with JWT authentication and Stripe integration.
challenges: Implementing secure role-based authorization across frontend and backend
Managing complex payment flow with Stripe and ensuring transaction verification
Synchronizing contest approval workflow between creators and admins
Handling state management for multi-role dashboards efficiently
Ensuring payment validation before confirming contest participation
futurePlans: Add real-time notifications for contest updates and winner announcements
Implement leaderboard and ranking system for top participants
Create social sharing features for contests and achievements
Add multi-currency support for international users
Integrate analytics dashboard for contest creators to track performance
Build commenting and feedback system for contests
Add automated email reminders for contest deadlines
Implement portfolio showcase for winners to display their work

projects.name: Hero Apps
projects.shortDescription: Website to showcase a selection of apps

details.description: Users can view apps with trending ones shown separately. Search functionality is available and users can see details with detailed analysis of ratings.
challenges: Scaling app performance with growing app catalog
Optimizing search with typos and vague queries
Managing load times for analytics-heavy pages
futurePlans: Add personalized app recommendations based on user preferences and history
Implement user reviews and comments for community engagement
Create comparison tools to view multiple apps side-by-side
Add filtering options by category, price range, and ratings
Integrate with app stores for direct installation or purchase links
Build a watchlist feature so users can track apps they're interested in
Add price tracking and alerts for paid apps going on sale
Implement advanced analytics like rating trends over time and version comparisons
